data.actual_result: The button highlights like it's still an available option to press.
data.expected_result: It shouldn't highlight, because once you send the invite, the action is irreversible, making the button no longer an option to press.
data.short_description: "Sent" button highlights in the new invite model, after you send an invite.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up the new invite model. - Send an invite to someone. - After you send, it should say "Sent". Long-hold the button.
